properties.body:
EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
MONTSERRAT.
VESSEL PIROGUE, BLUE HULL WITH WHITE STRIPE,
FOUR PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT
DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE VICINITY 16-34N 062-16W
ON 14 JAN. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO
KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
INMARSAT-C: 422799024, TELEX: 42912008,
PHONE: 59 659 670 9292, FAX: 59 659 663 2450,
E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
